::Killfest::

Killfest frowns and nods. "I see."

He had no particular admiration for either the Predacons or the 
Maximals, he only sided with the Preds because they didn't mind 
killing.

"Do the Alliance and the Maximals together outnumber the Predacons?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> 
> "Yes there is. They are Predacons, as are we, but they defend the 
> Maximals. They are traitorous to our own kind. They fight and kill 
> us, and defend our mortal enemy. They have to be stopped in order 
to 
> crush the maximals. That is why we are warring with them."
